title: 4DRC GO
description: The Drone can be controlled through the mobile phone, and the camera picture of the Drone can be viewed on the mobile phone, and the pictures and videos can be saved to the mobile phone storage.The application needs to be matched with the Drone of the corresponding style. For details, please refer to the Drone 's instructions.

For details, please refer to the Drone 's instructions.
